physics.comment: All principled constants with empirical derivation. Code reads from here only. Policy parameters stay in their own blocks below.

phi.source: Golden ratio — structural packing ratio at which branching tension reaches critical density. Appears in crystal formation, phyllotaxis, and any branching structure where discrete units accumulate.

lambda.source: Ebbinghaus forgetting curve — empirically measured retention rate. Activity-relative inactivity drives the exponent, not clock time.

temporality_multiplier.comment: Derived from predicate temporality axis. permanent=no decay. semi-permanent=slow decay. transient=fast decay.

beta.comment: SDT cost asymmetry. beta = cost(false_positive) / cost(false_negative). log(beta) is the correct SDT criterion position.

dedup.source: SDT — false alarm (losing distinct info) 3x worse than miss (mild bloat)

retrieval.source: SDT — miss (lost context) 3x worse than false alarm (mild noise)

consensus.source: SDT — false alarm (bad permanent memory) 5x worse than miss (slow backbone growth)

quorum.source: Quorum sensing — collective action emerges when aggregate signal strength crosses emergent threshold. No head count. No voting round.

bootstrap.comment: Below min_corpus_size, prior is computed from predicate table axis variance at init and stored in meta. Emergency fallback if meta not yet initialized.

decay.comment: Backbone nodes permanent — zero decay. All decay constants in physics.lambda.

stakes_multiplier.comment: Human risk policy — scales consensus threshold for high-stakes decisions. Only non-physics parameter in the consensus pipeline.

injection.comment: max_summary_groups caps rendered subject+predicate summary groups. budget_chars is the hard floor.

predicates.comment: Seed vocabulary loaded into predicates table at first init. After init the table owns the vocabulary — this block is not read again for validation.
